properties.description: Load data from excel to sql

activities.name: GetMetadata_readFileNames
activities.description: read excel file names stored in blob container

activities.name: fromExcelToSql
activities.description: copy data from excel file located in blob to sql database

source.sqlReaderQuery:
update tblNBIS_MTDPremium
set IsCurrent = 0
select 1 as DummyValue
select top 10 Document from [dbo].[tblDocumentStore] where year(DateAdded) = 2021
